Class ComplainsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Customers.ComplainsController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class ComplainsController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controller Complains controller performs adding new complains and follow them

      • getPassedTimeInText

        private javafx.scene.text.Text getPassedTimeInText(java.sql.Timestamp currentTime,
                                                   java.sql.Timestamp oldTime)
        Parameters:
        currentTime - - to define the current system time
        oldTime - - to define the complain's creation date
        Returns:
        Text component with the passed time. Calculate the passed time from the complain's creation time, Then create a Text component which is colored by a red color if passed more than 12 hours, else will be colored with green.

      • getReplyByComplain

        private Reply getReplyByComplain(Complain complain)
        Parameters:
        complain - to get reply by
        Returns:
        the reply relies to this complain
